nodes.text: B5-R8 was a protocol droid that operated during the time of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. The droid was present on CZ-198 as a supply vendor providing captured gear for Republic forces and the Adjudicators engaged in the Seizure of CZ-198.
B5-R8 was first added as a Reputation Vendor to the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.3. The droid was later removed in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
